element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the probability of occurrence of values in each cell of a raster layer, based on the Student's probability distribution.

element.name: DEGREES
element.text: The degrres of freedom in the above formula.

element.name: CDF
element.text: Select this option if you want the resulting values to represent the accumulated probability instead of the simple one

element.name: PROBABILITY
element.text: The layer with calculated probability values.
